relnotes.name: System Agent
relnotes.purpose: A collection of system agent executables to support Kernel services e.g. PnS, HAL

relnotes.defect: HalSettings updated to provide an option to allow some platforms to not save HALData::EPenState attribute.
Added SA prefix to variable names of LBS constants defined in sacls.h

defect.title: Secure Clock: Syslibs change needed to persist nonsecure offset

relnotes.defect: Add the processing to EChangesSystemTime notification.

defect.title: halsettings.exe does not use standard Symbian OS VID

deliverystep.name: Filename policy changes
deliverystep.preq: Updating the component source files to comply with the Symbian filename policy.

relnotes.minorchange: Symbian OS v9.3 component branched from common codeline

defect.title: A small possibility for halsettings.exe to go infinite loop while initializing

relnotes.defect: Check the HAL.DAT filesize against the possible max filesize, return KErrCorrupt if this is not within the bounds.
Enhanced the Test code to include proper error codes and failure checks.
